description: Try our easy to follow Lentil & Goat's Cheese Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Lentil & Goat's Cheese Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g can Puy lentils in water, drained and rinsed

recipeInstructions.text: Place the spinach, lentils, peppers and walnut pieces in a bowl and mix gently.
Whisk together the dressing ingredients in a small bowl and season to taste. Pour over the lentil mixture and toss lightly to combine. Divide between 4 bowls and top with the cheese.
